metadata.title: CVE-2017-7508 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenVPN versions before 2.4.3 and before 2.3.17 are vulnerable to remotedenial-of-service when receiving malformed IPv6 packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.3.2-7ubuntu3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.2-7ubuntu3.2').
